html:
2.12.24  11:18 am   I'm a beautiful slug who glistens in the sunlight. Are you proud of me? 

      yes

2.12.24  10:20 am   What is your favourite day of the year?

      january 1

2.12.24  10:05 am   Why are all of my favorite songs of yours in E major?

      i have no idea

2.12.24  9:58 am   pancakes are called that because you used to have to pan for them in a stream.  like gold.  soggy pancakes from the river

      that makes sense

2.12.24  9:54 am   ive noticed that when some musicians experiment with world music, they use gamelan or imitation gamelan percussion. have you experimented with it or similar, let's call it "non-contemporary (with big quotations)" percussion? am i obsessed with gamelan?

      sure. i'll use anything i can get my hands on

2.12.24  9:41 am   what is your opinion on   adding  extra  spaces    to  text?

      it's lovely. so lovely it's sometimes illegal

2.12.24  8:29 am   What is the overall goal of your life?

      we'll see

2.12.24  8:26 am   how do i motivate myself for studying

      i don't think that's possible. you are either motivated to do it or you are not. maybe if you understand what it is your studying and why you are asking, you might find out that there is motivation already there. in fact, already, something already has motivated you to inquire about this

2.12.24  8:16 am   what is the meaning of life?

      a trick question, to make you think there is only 1

2.12.24  7:43 am   When does normality become abnormal?

      day in, and day out

2.12.24  7:22 am   Should we allow people the right to sometimes be baffled?

      as rights allower, you should indeed allow this right

2.12.24  4:42 am   What's your least favourite thing that you like?

      dessert

2.12.24  2:48 am   should i quit my job

      not yet

2.12.24  1:04 am   What exactly is a scheme?

      it's like a plan, but it's more mischievous

2.12.24  12:33 am   Why are you so nice to us 

      for good measure

2.11.24  11:57 pm   what do you call a music recording without lyrics?

     an instrumental music recording

     can it still be called a song? maybe a piece, or a track, or something else entirely?

     sure

2.11.24  11:53 pm   Is there any reason why one would use a semiflat or semisharp in music (lowering/raising a note by a quarter-tone)?  

     it looks extremely impressive on paper, especially to people who are in the midst of their music education. but there might be other reasons i don't know about

     Is it ever used?  

     generally no. when it is, it is usually advertised as such. they will let you know explicitly that they are doing it

     Can anything even play that?

      sure. a trombone could play it. your voice could sing it. you can set up a digital instrument to accomodate it

2.11.24  11:34 pm   how come conspiracy theories aren't called conspiracy hypotheses

      maybe they are

2.11.24  11:10 pm   how do you feel about how many lives you've changed?

      good i think

2.11.24  9:47 pm   Why are you so cool

      as a last resort. or first, if it comes down to it

2.11.24  9:19 pm   What does "almost" mean in response to "are you proud of me"? I'm not the person who asked initially,

I can't help but wonder if I am missing some context here.

      of course. the person didn't include enough context in the question. but there was 'almost' enough

2.11.24  9:06 pm   What is your fav color

      surprise me

2.11.24  6:09 pm   are you happy?

      almost

2.11.24  6:07 pm   who do you want to win the super bowl

      everyone

2.11.24  5:18 pm   What really makes someone insincere?

      it's hard to tell

2.11.24  4:54 pm   how do i be a little more hardcore

      how about going for a walk

2.11.24  4:27 pm   how much is a lot?

      literally so much

2.11.24  3:15 pm   Do you like multitasking?

      sure, as long as it's not while i am multitasking

2.11.24  2:11 pm   opinions on the "big apple" (new york)? 

      no one really calls it that, unless they are living either outside new york, in the past, or both. but that's ok

2.11.24  12:59 pm   is there a word that's the opposite of "comparison"?

      contrast?

2.11.24  9:33 am   Hi Bill! I've noticed you seem to have an affinity for scribbles/squiggly lines. They're beautiful and I see them in your videos a lot. What is the reason for this? 

      if beautiful, then that would be reason enough. if not, then perhaps i somehow hope that they are

2.11.24  9:17 am   any tips for a recital i have coming up?

      i'm not entirely sure i know what a recital is

2.11.24  8:14 am   What kinds of questions do you answer

      good, bad,

2.11.24  7:50 am   How do you deal with the concept of the flow and relativity of time when perceiving your work?

      it depends on my mood

2.11.24  6:44 am   when is it ever a good time to do anything at all?

      anytime

2.11.24  5:14 am   do you like the ends of the bread loaf

      i like the beginning

2.11.24  5:11 am   what is the most specific "sub-genre" that comes to mind

      2.11.24,  5:11 am

2.11.24  3:54 am   what's the weather today

      it's normal

2.11.24  3:16 am   I often walk my cat, but most of the time he walks me back. It's mutually beneficial because it's often the only time I'm out in the sun and we both get to enjoy "outside." Is "i like to wear soft clothing" a love song for you? For me, it is!

      there are moments of the chorus that feel that way

2.11.24  1:01 am   can a match box

      yes

2.10.24  11:37 pm   what was in the box in the unboxing video

      the second camera

2.10.24  10:53 pm   Just wanted you to know that the "and I'm bobbling down 124th street" part of your song Slow Down made me physically bobble my head up and down. Thanks.

      glad i could help

2.10.24  9:55 pm   how long does it take you to write a song?

      any amount of time

2.10.24  9:18 pm   do you like computers

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

2.10.24  9:10 pm   so i wrote a question for you a while ago about if you suddenly had to use a walking stick, what it'd look like, or similar, but i just remembered today at 4 am that i asked this question. i looked at my pinned notes to find the exact question so i can find the answer easier, but its nowhere to be found. ive looked through the website so far at this point im almost certain it isnt real, but it still feel real. all of this happening reminded me of how when i was younger, i would often send messages to famous people, and always getting no reply. i always felt bad about it back then and i dismissed it because i was just a kid back then, though my strong frustration at something this small has proven thats still the case. i feel as though things like this are becoming more common, where peole tend to be much more isolated and reliant on creators nowadays. its this bizzare blend of "this is a real person" and "this is my ideal imagined friend i constructed based on this person's art", that ive seen so often on the internet. ?

      the question was most likely from december 2, 2023, at 11:58 am, and it said "If you suddenly had to use a walking stick every day, what would it look like?". and the reason i probably didn't answer it is because it evoked the idea of sudden back or leg injury, which was above the level of mental trauma that i like to subject myself to on the questions page. the reason you couldn't find the question in your notes is probably just because you forgot to write it down

2.10.24  9:03 pm   why am i not the person i want to be

      because it will be fun for you to figure out how to be who you want to be. at least it will seem like it was fun when you look back on it

2.10.24  8:23 pm   unoriginal question but what is the meaning of "is slef"

      "is self", with casual spelling

2.10.24  5:40 pm   what do all your songs have in common

      my self

2.10.24  4:05 pm   have you ever felt like everything used to make sense and then it didnt anymore?

     briefly

     what do you do in this situation?

     i'm able to imagine this same feeling occuring in the future about the present day

2.10.24  3:28 pm   what is your favorite song that you made

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite
